Expend spell slots to regain hit points while in Wild Shape.

Lunar Mend is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Lunar Mend is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Circle of the Moon Druid Subclass. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
